response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $11,000 for this exclusive item. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 11000}
